org.anarres.qemu.exec

Class QEmuCommandLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.anarres.qemu.exec.QEmuCommandLine

  • public class QEmuCommandLine
extends Object
    An execution command line for a QEmu process. A QEmuCommandLine is a tree of QEmuOption, not a list (see QEmuOptionsList). Disk and bus IDs within a QEmuOption may be allocated using the embedded QEmuIdAllocator in order to guarantee uniqueness. For convenience, composites of commonly used options are provided as QEmuRecipes.

      • getCommandName

        @Nonnull
public String getCommandName()
        Returns the name (possibly with path) of the binary used to execute qemu. This is derived from getArchitecture() if not explicitly set using setCommandName(java.lang.String).

      • setCommandName

      • getOption

        @CheckForNull
public <T extends QEmuOption> T getOption(@Nonnull
                                                        Class<T> type)
        Returns the first option of the specified type in this command line. If there are no options of type type, null is returned. If there is more than one option of type type, the subsequent options are ignored.
